page.title: 09Family life
page.content: Most families in the area appear to be fairly similar in size.There is usually four members.Here is an example of a child's view of the family."There are four in my family .There is my mum who stays at home.She does quite often come up and help in the commmunity centre with the preschool.My dad works at home most of the time.He works with computers.He sometimes has to go to lots of different countries.My brother is still at school.He goes to the high school.He's the clever one in the family.He's always getting things right and gets loads of merit marks for his homework.He's mad about computers.He's got four.I'm the baby of the family.I'm quite clever but not that much.My dad's very quiet but my mum does alot of the shouting.I like my family."
